mapper.select: SELECT * FROM noticeview where ${field} like '%${query}%' order by regdate desc limit #{offset},#{size}
select count(id) count from notice where ${field} like '%${query}%'
select * from notice where regdate > (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) limit 1;
select * from notice where regdate < (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) order by regdate desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content= #{content}, hit= #{hit}, pub= #{pub} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(title, content, memberId) VALUES(#{title},#{content},#{memberId});
